actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to prohibit the purchase of Iranian and Libyan oil to fill the Strategic Petroleum Reserve, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Anti-Terrorist Petroleum Acquisition Act of 1982 - Declares that the purpose of this Act is to prevent efforts to fill the Strategic Petroleum Reserve from resulting in financing Iranian and Libyan Terrorism. Amends the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to prohibit the acquisition of Iranian or Libyan petroleum for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to prohibit the purchase of Iranian and Libyan oil to fill the Strategic Petroleum Reserve, and for other purposes.
